mapper.select: select count(*) from ope_wms_qualified_scooter_stock stock where stock.dr = 0

select stock.id, stock.qty, group1.group_name, color.color_name, color.color_value from ope_wms_qualified_scooter_stock stock left join ope_specificat_group group1 on group1.id = stock.group_id left join ope_color color on color.id = stock.color_id where stock.dr = 0
order by stock.qty desc limit #{enter.startRow},#{enter.pageSize}

select stock.id, group1.group_name, color.color_name, color.color_value from ope_wms_qualified_scooter_stock stock left join ope_specificat_group group1 on group1.id = stock.group_id left join ope_color color on color.id = stock.color_id where stock.dr = 0 and stock.id = #{id}
select count(*) from ope_wms_qualified_combin_stock where dr = 0

select id, combin_no, cn_name, en_name, fr_name, qty from ope_wms_qualified_combin_stock where dr = 0
order by qty limit #{enter.startRow},#{enter.pageSize}

sql.if: and ( combin_no like concat('%',#{enter.keyword},'%') or en_name like concat('%',#{enter.keyword},'%') or cn_name like concat('%',#{enter.keyword},'%') )

mapper.select: select id, combin_no, cn_name, en_name from ope_wms_qualified_combin_stock where dr = 0 and id = #{id}
select count(*) from ope_wms_qualified_parts_stock where dr = 0

select id, parts_no, cn_name, en_name, fr_name, qty from ope_wms_qualified_parts_stock where dr = 0
order by qty desc limit #{enter.startRow},#{enter.pageSize}

sql.if: and ( parts_no like concat('%',#{enter.keyword},'%') or en_name like concat('%',#{enter.keyword},'%') or cn_name like concat('%',#{enter.keyword},'%') )

mapper.select: select id, parts_no, parts_type, en_name, cn_name from ope_wms_qualified_parts_stock where dr = 0 and id = #{id}
select sum(in_wh_qty) from ope_wms_stock_record where dr = 0 and record_type = #{recordType} and relation_type in (4,5,6) and created_time like concat('%',#{date},'%') and stock_type = 1
